abilities.name: Pure Body
abilities.text: To attach a Lightning Energy card from your hand to Raikou, you must discard an Energy card attached to Raikou. (Attach the Lightning energy, and then discard an Energy card from Raikou.)

attacks.name: Lightning Sphere
attacks.text: You may flip a coin. If heads, discard all Energy cards attached to Raikou. This attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.
